name: @microfox/brave
title: Brave TypeScript SDK
description: TypeScript SDK for the Brave search API, providing functions for web search, summarizer search, image search, video search, news search, suggestions, and spellcheck.

readme_map.title: @microfox/@microfox/brave README
readme_map.description: The full README for the Brave TypeScript SDK

constructors.name: createBraveSDK
constructors.description: Create a new Brave TypeScript SDK client through which you can interact with the API

requiredKeys.description: The API key required to authenticate requests to the Brave Search API. You can obtain this key from the Brave Search API dashboard.

keysInfo.description: The API key required to authenticate requests to the Brave Search API. You can obtain this key from the Brave Search API dashboard.

extraInfo: Use the `createBraveSDK` constructor to create a new client.
